name: SMOL (omgiszbeast)
description:
You crash onto this unknown planet and have to survive the elements. You, the dominant species of the planet Raid must survive what the seemingly unintelligent lifeforms of this strange new planet throw at you.

Credits:

Level Design and Scripting: Ignacio Flores

Scripting: Kolten Sinclair

Art and Animations: Wyatt McWilliams and Aicha Ndir

Music: SVL

Additional Information:

Our School's CS Club Discord: https://discord.gg/DHAQ5xFYeb
All Artwork was originally made.

Game Jam Theme: Unexplored Planet
